SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am11
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am11.model.players

Class PersonalSpace

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am11.model.players.PersonalSpace
public class PersonalSpace extends Object
This class represents the personal space of a player. It contains the player's hand, objectives, and candidate objectives.
